channel.title: [PI] Character start location height?
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering how do i make my starting location have a height to it? I have an area that on a height of 1 but theres no option to change it? if someone knows how to change this please help me :)
thanks

item.title: [PI] Character start location height?
item.dc:creator: @Pkz-Evolution Pkz-Evolution
item.description:
@Pkz-Evolution wrote:

I donâ€™t really know what you mean.

Well this is the option i think you might mean.

Go to your Character file and go on your profile then you should see

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3092 character-posy = 3502 character-rights = 0 crystal-bow-shots = 0

Too change where the character start when they are a new player

Make sure your RIGHT IS 3 AS A OWNER

Go to the place where you want the person to start then do

::mypos

Then go to

Config.java

Then you should see something like

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3092; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3502;

For a example i walk to edge and i want them to spawn there

i do ::mypos in game then i get the area cooords

my pos was 3092 , 3502

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3092;
public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3502;

Hope this helps

Regards -
Pkz-Evolution

Read full topic
